ValueSet-IMMZD5DTMeningococcalContraindi.description: JSON Schema for IMMZD5DTMeningococcalContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
enum: http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#The client has history of severe allergic reactions-59
http://smart.who.int/immunizations/CodeSystem/IMMZDAK#Meningococcal vaccination could be contraindicated. Clinical judgement is required. Create a clinical note-130
ValueSet-IMMZD5DTMeningococcalContraindi.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the IMMZD5DTMeningococcalContraindications ValueSet for Decision Table ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/immunizations/ValueSet-IMMZD5DTMeningococcalContraindicationsVS.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
